## not() function

Inverts a given predicate (negates its output)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function not(fn: TFunction<boolean>): TFunction<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>TFunction&lt;boolean&gt;</code> | The predicate to invert |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TFunction<boolean>`

The negated predicate.

## Remarks

This function is meant to be a condition for [If()](./vue-extra-decorators.if.md) alike methods.

## Example


```TS
  @If(not(wasPrevented))
  private doSomething(ev: Event) {
    // wasPrevented returns false
  }

```
